subtitle: Our Impact
title:
Racing to Pay
It Forward
text: For every race or event we participate in, we pay it forward to a local or national non-profit. Your participation isn’t just a workout; it’s a powerful act of community support. When you join us, you help us to:
bulletOne: Empower children by giving them a voice and a space to thrive.
bulletTwo: Support local businesses and non-profits by connecting them through our events.
bulletThree: Support local businesses and non-profits by connecting them through our events.
